page.title: 14OLD HALL FARM
page.content: The farm owner employs two people. {His transport is a Volvo and a Fiesta He has lived there 42 years.He has{184 {cows.}The farmers{milk goes to {Crudgington}where they make Clover butter and dried milk.He buys barley from another farmer.The average price per litre of milk is 15p.He has two cattle dogs.{One cow makes 5500 litres {of milk each year.}The farm owner uses weed killer.He sprays it with a sparyer to make the grass good for the cows and calves.The farm owner uses tractors to drive the machinery.He buys his goods from South Shropshire Farmers.The only animals the farmer has are cows.The size of the farm is 190 acres .The farm house is 500 years old . He gets his animals from a Shrewsbury market.
